name: Bear Shop
overview:
Bear Shop (www.bearshop.in) is an India based online social price comparison service for gadgets and electronic products. It let users, find the lowest prices on the products they want to buy. Bear Shop monitors product prices across leading Indian online stores on daily basis, thus keeping a track of price changes at any store. This information is presented to the user in a stock-market like 30 day graph, showing the price fluctuations if any and the all-time high-low price of the product, to help user decide the right time of purchase at the best price.

Users can find the lowest price on LCD/LED/Plasma TVs, cameras, gadgets, mobile phones, laptops, accessories, video games, and more.

Users can follow an item and get alerts when the prices change. They can also set their own price bid on any item and be notified when the price reaches close to the bid.
